conbody.p: Use the Browse button in Quiz Builder Answers panel to select a graphic file for the question. Press Select hot spots button to open label editor where you can specify the labels and where they should be placed.

Click on the image and drag the mouse pointer across to select an area, then click on the selection and type the label text inside the selected area. Press the white rectangle button at the bottom of the editor window to change opacity of the selected area. Click on the red x mark at the upper right corner of an area to delete the area.
